title: Spicy West African Sweet Potato Soup

Ingredients.5: 0.5 teaspoon ground cumin, or more to taste

Ingredients.9: 5 medium sweet potatoes, peeled and diced

Ingredients.11: 1 medium jalapeno pepper, seeded and minced

Ingredients.12: 2 cups vegetable broth, or as needed

Ingredients.14: 0.5 cup peanut butter, or more to taste

Ingredients.16: 1 teaspoon lime juice, or more to taste

Directions.1: Heat oil in a stockpot over medium heat. Add onion and saute until translucent, about 5 minutes. Add garlic and ginger; cook until fragrant, about 1 minute. Add cumin, turmeric, paprika, and pepper flakes, then sweet potatoes, diced tomatoes, and jalapeno. Add enough broth to cover potatoes.

Directions.2: Cook until potatoes are tender, 15 to 30 minutes depending on how small you cut the potatoes. Add coconut milk and peanut butter; stir. Add spinach to the top; cover and steam until tender, 2 to 3 minutes.

Directions.3: Squeeze some lime juice over the pot or the individual bowls.
